# dnn-monaco-editor



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                     | Description                           |
| ------------------------ | ------------------------------------- |
| `--monaco-editor-height` | height of the editor, default is 50vh |
| `--monaco-editor-width`  | width of the editor, default is 100%  |
